document_data.name: Skeemo Weirdbottle
document_data.mainbody: '''Skeemo Weirdbottle''' ({{Pronounce|SKEE|moh|refs=}}) was a [[rock gnome]] agent of the [[Zhentarim]], operating within the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Skeemo had no loyalty to his friends.
document_data.Relationship: Skeemo was a member of the [[Doom Raiders]] adventuring company. He and his former companions composed the leadership of the Zhentarim of Waterdeep. Skeemo secretly spied on his former companions under the  payroll of the [[Gralhund |House Gralhund]] and [[Manshoon|Manshoon's]] Zhentarim.
document_data.History:
Skeemo was once an adventurer but together with his adventuring companions he decided to join the Zhentarim. In [[1489 DR]], they were sent to establish a Zhent foothold in Waterdeep.

In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} as a cover, Skeemo  managed a shop in the [[Trades Ward of Waterdeep|Trades Ward]], [[Weirdbottle's Concoctions]], where he sold non-magical potions.
